duties_responsibilities.duty: Create and execute strategic sales plans focused on Remote Patient Monitoring of patients with chronic diseases.
Enhance current capabilities and drive new product lines in the health systems vertical.
Lead revenue generation and business development efforts, cultivating key executive relationships in the health systems vertical.
Measure and analyze current revenue streams, offerings, and relationships to optimize business growth and revenue strategy.
Identify new and innovative ways to grow business partnerships.
Act as a lead individual contributor on revenue generation.
Manage a remote region with 25%-50% travel depending on location and business relations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree is required, MBA is a major plus.
